Posts.Content: Lulugirl wrote: I had my mastectomy and DIEP reconstruction in NOLA on Jan. 25th  after which I had a lot of bruising and swelling in the breast, the worst part being a "shelf" that has since subsided but my breast is still bruised and hard.  I've been told that this can take weeks to resolve. If anyone out there has had a similar experience, please could you let me know how long it took before the breast felt and looked like a regular breast.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Swollen, hard breast Lulugirl Galsal

Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2012 11:00AM Lulugirl wrote: I think that I am probably being somewhat impatient, so perhaps that's the lesson here, but it would be so nice to have a normal looking "girl".   I'll just take a few breaths and be grateful for the journey thus far.  I have so much to be grateful for.
Posts.Title: Swollen, hard breast Lulugirl Galsal
